Mobility.description: Contains data related to rides, vehicles, and real-time trip details.

trips.schema: trip_id (INT), driver_id (INT), city (VARCHAR), distance_miles (FLOAT), fare_usd (FLOAT), trip_status (VARCHAR), trip_date (DATE)
trips.rules: The column `trip_status` must be 'completed' to count a successful trip. Always filter by `trip_date` when a time frame is provided.
trips.sample_query: SELECT count(trip_id) FROM trips WHERE trip_date = '2025-10-24' AND trip_status = 'completed';

Core Services.description: Contains HR, payroll, and static user/driver data.

drivers.schema: driver_id (INT), name (VARCHAR), license_status (VARCHAR), vehicle_make (VARCHAR), hire_date (DATE), annual_bonus_target (INT), current_rating (FLOAT), long_term_retention_score (FLOAT)
drivers.rules: To check for an active driver, filter on `license_status` = 'active'. The `long_term_retention_score` column is rarely needed.
drivers.sample_query: SELECT name, current_rating FROM drivers WHERE license_status = 'active';
